mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_FILE_INIT_HOUSE (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_card_no ,
file_code ,
file_name ,
equi_usage_code ,
file_url ,
location ,
spell_code ,
wbx_code ,
is_stop ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{file_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{file_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{equi_usage_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{file_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{spell_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{wbx_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{is_stop,jdbcType=INTEGER}
)
mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_card_no, a.file_code, a.file_name, a.equi_usage_code, b.equi_usage_name, a.file_url, a.location, a.spell_code, a.wbx_code, a.is_stop FROM ASS_FILE_INIT_HOUSE a left join ass_file_type_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.equi_usage_code = b.equi_usage_code WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.file_code = #{file_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
